catalog_script_client.name: Get Ru count form CMDB

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_7f00d78a97b03110e25972d6f053af93
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b1721c2b97153110e25972d6f053af73</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Get Ru count form CMDB</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
    var formVal = g_form.getValue('what_is_the_resource_unit_number');
    var ga = new GlideAjax('currentRuCount');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCmdbCount');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_ru_name', formVal);
    ga.getXML(countParse);

    function countParse(response) {

        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

        var clearvalue;

        if (answer) {

            var returneddata = answer;

            g_form.setValue("current_month_count", returneddata);
			g_form.addInfoMessage("number is "+returneddata );

        } else {

            g_form.setValue("current_month_count", clearvalue);

        }

    }


}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-23 11:30:27</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7f00d78a97b03110e25972d6f053af93</sys_id><sys_mod_count>36</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Ru count form CMDB</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Account Financials" source="x_323515_account_0">571aa98d975c3110e25972d6f053af59</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Account Financials">571aa98d975c3110e25972d6f053af59</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7f00d78a97b03110e25972d6f053af93</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-21 10:00:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
